com.aliyun.oss.common.auth

接口 CredentialsProvider

  • 所有已知实现类:
    CustomSessionCredentialsProvider, DefaultCredentialProvider, EcsRamRoleCredentialsProvider, EnvironmentVariableCredentialsProvider, InstanceProfileCredentialsProvider, ProfileCredentialsProvider, STSAssumeRoleSessionCredentialsProvider, STSKeyPairSessionCredentialsProvider, SystemPropertiesCredentialsProvider

    public interface CredentialsProvider
    Abstract credentials provider that maintains only one user credentials. Users can switch to other valid credentials with OSS.switchCredentials(com.aliyun.oss.common.auth.Credentials) Note that implementations of this interface must be thread-safe.

      void setCredentials(Credentials creds)
